title: Remove authenticated-only Upload button from header navigation

requirements.summary: Stop rendering the authenticated-only "Upload" button in the app header navigation while keeping routing and upload access unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When authenticated, the App header navigation no longer shows the "Upload" button (the second <button> in the <nav>).
When unauthenticated, the App header navigation still shows the "Gallery" button and the Login/Logout control continues to work.
All other routes and upload access behavior remain unchanged (users can still access the Upload view via existing routing mechanisms).
All user-facing text remains in English.

file_operations.description: Remove rendering of the authenticated-only Upload navigation button (the second <Button> within the <nav>) so it no longer appears in the header. Limit changes strictly to this button block to comply with the XPath-scoped constraint; keep the Gallery button and existing routing behavior intact, and avoid edits under frontend/src/components/ui.
